channel.title: Erica Huggins on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Erica Huggins on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Naked Gun’ Producers Seth MacFarlane and Erica Huggins Talk Greenlight Hurdles and Sequel Possibilities
item.description: “People want a little more variety on their plate,” says McFarlane in explaining why comedy is a viable theatrical genre despite Hollywood’s fears of its demise.
